name: Tequila Platformer
description:
It's my first game, made in pure Java.

Graphics: free assets from opengameart.org oraz gameart2d.com

Music: free stuff from opengameart.org.

Main features:

  • pure Java
  • 100% free
  • 10 level + final
  • western climate
  • collectibles
  • power gems
  • global High Scores

More features will be added in the future...
